Uses of Package
peril.views.slick.states

  • Packages that use peril.views.slick.states 
    Package Description
    peril.views.slick  
    peril.views.slick.helpers  
    peril.views.slick.states  
    peril.views.slick.states.gameStates  
  • Classes in peril.views.slick.states used by peril.views.slick 
    Class and Description
    InteractiveState
    A BasicGameState that allows the user to click on Button and displays Viewable objects.
  • Classes in peril.views.slick.states used by peril.views.slick.helpers 
    Class and Description
    Credits
    The InteractiveState of the Game where the credits are displayed.
    EndState
    The final InteractiveState where the winner and losers are displayed.
    Instructions
    The InteractiveState of the game where the instructions of the entire game are displayed.
    LoadingScreen
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a loading screen.
    MainMenu
    Encapsulates the behaviour of the main menu.
    Opening
    The opening splash screen of the game.
    PlayerSelection
    The InteractiveState that allows the user to select the number of SlickPlayers and the AI that control those SlickPlayers.
  • Classes in peril.views.slick.states used by peril.views.slick.states 
    Class and Description
    InteractiveState
    A BasicGameState that allows the user to click on Button and displays Viewable objects.
    MainMenu.Map
    A wrapper for the details of a map in the MainMenu.maps list.
    PlayerSelection.Player
    Encapsulates the details about a player that is displayed on the PlayerSelection screen.
  • Classes in peril.views.slick.states used by peril.views.slick.states.gameStates 
    Class and Description
    InteractiveState
    A BasicGameState that allows the user to click on Button and displays Viewable objects.
